data.description: Generate a XUL interface using CGI
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module extends CGI.pm and allows for the creation of dynamic
    XUL (Mozilla's eXtensible User interface Language) interfaces as an
    additional CGI output option. It will also include support for
    dynamically generating standard CSS files for use with HTML or XUL
    documents
